start_date.description: The start date of the time off request

end_date.description: The end date of the time off request

start_half_day.description: True if the start of the time off request begins half way through the day

end_half_day.description: True if the end of the time off request ends half way through the day

time_off_policy_id.description: The time off policy id associated with this time off request
